channel.title: Form
channel.description:
I need help with a little form.... I want it to look something like the below:
-----
[img]http://img402.imageshack.us/img402/3861/helpsdo3.png[/img]
1. Area that has the text pop up when it applies: "Sorry, that username is already in use."
2. Username input area... I want it saved to a text file...
3. Password input area... I want it saved to a text file...
4. Password repeat area... Needs to be the same as above, or the text "Sorry, you have not repeated your password correctly." in the #1 area.
5. Email input area... I want it saved to a text file...
6. Radio button. If chosen, and they click a "Complete Order" button at the bottom, it will take them to a paypal page that makes them pay $100.00 USD. I want this to save something like "Lifetime Membership" in the text file.
7. Radio button. If chosen, and they click a "Complete Order" button at the bottom, it will take them to a paypal page that makes them pay $60.00 USD. I want this to save something like "Yearly Membership - DATEHERE" in the text file.
8. Radio button. If chosen, and they click a "Complete Order" button at the bottom, it will take them to a paypal page that makes them pay $18.00 USD. I want this to save something like "Bought 1 Template" in the text file. If they try to click "Complete Order" and the drop-down box bit has not been completed, I want it to say something like "Sorry, you need to choose a template." in the #1 area.
9. Drop-down box.. After they complete the paypal transaction for #8, I want them to be sent an email with a file in it of my choice...
----
If anyone can do this, it would be EXTREMELY helpful. I may even be willing to pay some money in the future.
-Alexia

item.title: Form
item.dc:creator: @sicarius99 sicarius99
item.description:
@sicarius99 wrote:

[code]<?
// declare values
$contact_email = $_POST[‘EmailAddress’];
$contact_subject = $_POST[‘Subject’];
$contact_name = $_POST[‘FullName’];
$contact_message = $_POST[‘Message’];
$mydate = date ( ‘l, F d Y g:i A’,time()+240 );

// where to send e-mail to
$to = ‘(e-mail here)’;

// e-mail subject
$subject = "
(subject here";

// e-mail message
$message = “You have received a contact message:\r\n”

."----------------------------------------------------------------\r\n"
.“Contact Name: $contact_name\r\n”
.“Subject: $contact_subject\r\n”
.“Submitted: $mydate\r\n”
.“From IP: {$_SERVER[‘REMOTE_ADDR’]}\r\n\r\n”
.“Message: $contact_message\r\n”
.“Form Address: {$_SERVER[‘SERVER_NAME’]}{$_SERVER[‘REQUEST_URI’]}”;

$headers = “From: $contact_name <$contact_email>\n”
.“Reply-To: $contact_email\n”
.“X-Mailer: PHP/”.phpversion();

// check for validation, then send the e-mail
if(empty($contact_name) || empty($contact_email) || empty($contact_subject) || empty($contact_message)) {
echo ’

Name:
Subject:
E-mail:
Message:
'; } elseif(!ereg("^[_a-z0-9-]+(\.[_a-z0-9-]+)*@[a-z0-9-]+(\.[a-z0-9-]+)*(\.[a-z]{2,3})$", $contact_email)) { echo "

ERROR: Please enter a valid e-mail address.

"; } else { mail( $to, $subject, $message, $headers ); echo "

Message Sent!

$contact_name,

We will get back to you as soon as possible at $contact_email."; } ?>[/code]

heres the code for a php contact form

were it says (e-mail here) put were you want it to send to and same for subject except put the subject[br][size=1]Posted on: January 03, 2007, 07:05:38 PM[/size][hr]also if you want to see what that looks like in a web page check
http://dastreetstyle.com/contact.php

Read full topic

item.title: Form
item.dc:creator: @alexia alexia
item.description:
@alexia wrote:

I need help with a little form… I want it to look something like the below:

  1. Area that has the text pop up when it applies: “Sorry, that username is already in use.”

  2. Username input area… I want it saved to a text file…

  3. Password input area… I want it saved to a text file…

  4. Password repeat area… Needs to be the same as above, or the text “Sorry, you have not repeated your password correctly.” in the #1 area.

  5. Email input area… I want it saved to a text file…

  6. Radio button. If chosen, and they click a “Complete Order” button at the bottom, it will take them to a paypal page that makes them pay $100.00 USD. I want this to save something like “Lifetime Membership” in the text file.

  7. Radio button. If chosen, and they click a “Complete Order” button at the bottom, it will take them to a paypal page that makes them pay $60.00 USD. I want this to save something like “Yearly Membership - DATEHERE” in the text file.

  8. Radio button. If chosen, and they click a “Complete Order” button at the bottom, it will take them to a paypal page that makes them pay $18.00 USD. I want this to save something like “Bought 1 Template” in the text file. If they try to click “Complete Order” and the drop-down box bit has not been completed, I want it to say something like “Sorry, you need to choose a template.” in the #1 area.

  9. Drop-down box… After they complete the paypal transaction for #8, I want them to be sent an email with a file in it of my choice…

If anyone can do this, it would be EXTREMELY helpful. I may even be willing to pay some money in the future.
